title: Things We Need to Stop Talking About | Heat Check
description:
Instant Replay: The Knicks make a hire, developments in the Giannis-Harden beef, and the Timberwolves get a resting policy violation (03:16).
The Main Event: We play Heat Check Survivor and vote tired conversations off Heat Check Island (22:58).
Good Call/Bad Call: Dan Devine gets a new nickname, the aftermath of the mystery box, and should the gang try a disgusting smoothie (37:49)?
Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Haley O'Shaughnessy, Dan Devine

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
